articles.author: Kyle Orland
articles.title: Nintendo patent explains Switch 2 Joy-Cons’ “mouse operation” mode - Ars Technica
articles.description: Users can access thumbsticks, shoulder buttons while sliding Joy-Cons on a flat surface.

articles.title: Despite Its Raw Power, The Snapdragon 8 Elite-Powered Galaxy S25 Ultra Managed Only 60 FPS In Genshin Impact, While The iPhone 16 Pro Max Averaged 95 FPS - Wccftech
articles.description: Samsung's latest Galaxy S25 Ultra held great against the iPhone 16 Pro Max, but fell short of beating it in higher FPS and power draw.
articles.content: Samsung announced its highly anticipated Galaxy S25 lineup last month, which comes with more or less the same design, but the internals have been improved a lot. The raw computational and graphical p… [+2959 chars]
